Tokens.text: Improper shutdown detected. System check initiated...
Testing command module. Manipulate data using anchor thoughts W, A, S, D, <, and >. Enter command HACK.

Tokens.text: You enter a warehouse. You LOOK and see shelves of boxes and equipment. Next to elevator, a rack with white lab COATS on it. To the EAST, a door labeled "Security Room." To the WEST, a door labeled "Server Room."

Tokens.innerText: if: $power is false and $ser_door is false
Tokens.name: if

Tokens.innerText: To the NORTH, an elevator with no power, sealed with the security door.

Tokens.innerText: To the NORTH, an elevator with power, with the security door opened.
Tokens.text: [To the NORTH, an elevator with power, with the security door opened.]

tokens.text: To the NORTH, an elevator with power, with the security door opened.

Tokens.innerText: Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk
Tokens.text: [Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk]

tokens.text: Doesn't look like the guard is following you. Must be pretty drunk

Tokens.text: You get into the elevator and descend to the lower floor.

You step off the elevator. Big room, circular. To the NORTH there’s a plastic locked cleanroom. Inside the cleanroom there is a tall machine in the center. LOOKing in front of you, a computer attached to a holographic projector blocks the cleanroom. It seems like it wants to TALK.
"Looks like you're human ... or, human enough. Opening cleanroom door." The cleanroom door to the NORTH hisses as it unlocks.
You pound on the hatch. Springs open. You haul yourself out of the tank.
You’re in a garage. Door to the NORTH, a keypad next to it. A desk with several drawers to LOOK through.
Enter command LOOK to engage sensory data collection when ready.

You wake up, floating. It's dark. Where are you? Can't remember. Is this death? You move your arm, feel water splash. Hmm, sensory deprivation tank. Like death, but lamer. The hatch is above you. Could probably OPEN it.

Critical message found in root directory: 'Hello agent. We have sent you to infiltrate a research facility that is developing a mind alteration machine. You have been outfitted with the implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. Good luck.'
You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There's a NOTE. You read it. Lots of numbers, but easy for your cyborg brain to take in.
You’re in a garage. Door to the NORTH, a keypad next to it.

Tokens.innerText: Door won’t open. Need a password for this keypad. [[LOOK-> LookGarage]]
Tokens.text: [Door won’t open. Need a password for this keypad. [[LOOK-> LookGarage]] ]

tokens.text: Door won’t open. Need a password for this keypad.

Tokens.text: The shelves are filled with boxes of electronics parts from Shenzhen. Power supplies, monitors, big plastic buttons. Surprisingly harmless stuff for a secret research base.

Tokens.innerText: Someone left a GUN there.  You take the GUN (set: $inv's GUN to true)
Tokens.text: [Someone left a GUN there.  You take the GUN (set: $inv's GUN to true)]

tokens.text: Someone left a GUN there.  You take the GUN

Tokens.text: You take a white lab COAT from the rack, put it on. The white really brings out the green in your ocular cybernetics.

Tokens.innerText: if: $power is true and $ser_door is true
Tokens.name: if

Tokens.innerText: if: $power is false or $ser_door is false
Tokens.name: if

Tokens.innerText: Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.(if: $inv's GUN is false)[[[LOOK-> LookWare]]] (if: $inv's COAT is false)[[[GET COAT-> GetCoat ]]] [[WEST-> Server]] [[EAST-> Security]]
Tokens.text: [Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.(if: $inv's GUN is false)[[[LOOK-> LookWare]]] (if: $inv's COAT is false)[[[GET COAT-> GetCoat ]]] [[WEST-> Server]] [[EAST-> Security]]]

tokens.text: Need to turn the power on in the Server Room and disable the security barrier in the Security Room first.

Tokens.text: Cabinet is secured with an electronic padlock. Don't want to think about what happens if you get caught stealing tech supplies around here.

Tokens.innerText:
(set: $infected to true)(set: $power to true)You reach up your nose, grab the wire in it and run it into the admin terminal. You begin to HACK into the facility’s electrical systems. You find the power controls for the elevator, switch them on.
As you disconnect from the admin terminal, you feel it transfer some packets your way. A malware infection! You need to find an anti-virus cure, fast!

tokens.text: You reach up your nose, grab the wire in it and run it into the admin terminal. You begin to HACK into the facility’s electrical systems. You find the power controls for the elevator, switch them on.
As you disconnect from the admin terminal, you feel it transfer some packets your way. A malware infection! You need to find an anti-virus cure, fast!

Tokens.innerText: You should probably leave the terminal alone.

You tap the key FOB onto the padlock. Cabinet swings open. Inside you find cables, dongles, a data stick labeled CURE. You grab the data stick.

You grab a stick of CURE, insert it into your data port. Ahhhh, sweet anti-virus. Your braindrive partition feels squeaky clean.

Tokens.innerText: You look closer at the calendar. Current year, 198X. A date circled says 'SHIPMENT TO PORTLAND, OR.' about 3 weeks away.

"I'll disable the security door on the elevator for you. Careful working too hard down there. I don’t want to have to drag you up here while you’re having one of those kicking and screaming fits again." The guard flips a switch on the console, and you hear the elevator security door retract in the warehouse.

tokens.text: You try, but the guard shoots you before you can!

Tokens.text: You SHOOT the guard. His body armor takes the hit, but the shot flings him back. He hits a switch on the console, gets knocked out cold. You hear the elevator security door retract in the warehouse. Convenient.

You enter the Server Room. Banks of computers, ready to be HACKed. Loud hum from the fans. Smells like stale sweat and microwaved pierogies. In front of you, an administrative terminal. A key FOB lies on top of it. Along the wall, a cabinet LOOKs back at you. The warehouse is back towards the EAST.

You walk into the Security Room. Big console of security monitors, currently malfunctioning. Guard lying next to the console. You LOOK at a large calendar on the wall. Warehouse to the WEST.

Tokens.innerText: if: $dead_g is false and $ser_door is false
Tokens.name: if

Tokens.innerText:
The guard notices you. He stands up, hand goes for a GUN at his side. He speaks Russian, which your T.E.T./R.I.S. translates. "Identify yourself!" You are unsure if he will let you TALK.
(if: $inv's COAT is true)[The guard’s eyes study your white lab COAT. Hand moves away from gun. "I don't remember any of you scientists having machinery packed into your skull. Then again, my memory's been shit recently. Maybe I should lay off drinking. Or drink more. Anyway, you need to get to the basement?"]

The guard’s eyes study your white lab COAT. Hand moves away from gun. "I don't remember any of you scientists having machinery packed into your skull. Then again, my memory's been shit recently. Maybe I should lay off drinking. Or drink more. Anyway, you need to get to the basement?"

Tokens.name: if
Tokens.text: (if: $inv's GUN is true and $guard is true)
The projector flickers on. Hologram of a head appears. It speaks. "Greetings, Please interact and submit to Turing test."

Tokens.innerText:
(set: $cor_ans to "FOB") You go over to the hologram head. "I'm Kapcha, security A.I. for Project Poly. No robots are allowed into the project site due to enhanced security measures, and because robots are filthy. Please submit to Turing test to prove you are not a filthy robot."
First question: What is something that opens things, that your boss would be mad if they found out you lost it? [[USE FOB-> AIFob]] [[USE COAT-> AICoat]] [[USE GUN-> AIGun]]
Tokens.text:
[(set: $cor_ans to "FOB") You go over to the hologram head. "I'm Kapcha, security A.I. for Project Poly. No robots are allowed into the project site due to enhanced security measures, and because robots are filthy. Please submit to Turing test to prove you are not a filthy robot."
First question: What is something that opens things, that your boss would be mad if they found out you lost it? [[USE FOB-> AIFob]] [[USE COAT-> AICoat]] [[USE GUN-> AIGun]]]

tokens.text: You go over to the hologram head. "I'm Kapcha, security A.I. for Project Poly. No robots are allowed into the project site due to enhanced security measures, and because robots are filthy. Please submit to Turing test to prove you are not a filthy robot."
First question: What is something that opens things, that your boss would be mad if they found out you lost it?

Tokens.innerText: "It's ironic that an A.I. like myself is programmed to despise robots. It's like being programmed to despise yourself. Honestly, the only thing that keeps me sane is taking comfort in MY UNDYING HATRED FOR MANGY DEGENERATE ROBOTS." [[NORTH-> Clean]]
Tokens.text: ["It's ironic that an A.I. like myself is programmed to despise robots. It's like being programmed to despise yourself. Honestly, the only thing that keeps me sane is taking comfort in MY UNDYING HATRED FOR MANGY DEGENERATE ROBOTS." [[NORTH-> Clean]]]

tokens.text: "It's ironic that an A.I. like myself is programmed to despise robots. It's like being programmed to despise yourself. Honestly, the only thing that keeps me sane is taking comfort in MY UNDYING HATRED FOR MANGY DEGENERATE ROBOTS."

Tokens.innerText:
Correct! 
Second question: tell me something that you could use to protect yourself from the elements, or to make a fashion statement. (set: $cor_ans to "COAT")
Tokens.text:
[Correct! 
Second question: tell me something that you could use to protect yourself from the elements, or to make a fashion statement. (set: $cor_ans to "COAT")]

tokens.text: Second question: tell me something that you could use to protect yourself from the elements, or to make a fashion statement.

That's an answer a robot would give! You get shocked. What item  opens things, that your boss would be mad if they found out you lost it?(set: $HP to it - 1) 
(if: $HP is 2)[YOU ARE PRETTY HURT, MAN](if: $HP is 1)[YOU ARE BASICALLY DEAD](if: $HP <= 0)[(set: $game_over to true)GAME OVER]

tokens.text: That's an answer a robot would give! You get shocked. What item could you use to make people beg for mercy?

Tokens.text: You go into the cleanroom. Door seals shut behind you. There is a table with some circuit boards on it. In the center, you LOOK at a tall machine. Screen set into it, control stick and buttons, an opened cabinet door near the bottom with ports to HACK into.

You look over at the tall machine. The cabient reads 'Copyright 198X Sensum Delere Games'. The scene shows a menu for a game called Polymathia, but doesn't seem like there's any way to start the game.

You HACK into the Polymathia software. You delve into the code. Recognize bits of it from your psyops training. Dark patterns, submodal suggestions, selective suppression, other pieces that you don’t understand. Cutting-edge indoctrination tech. The information is too much. Have to disconnect.

You jack out of the machine, feel dizzy. Questions spin through your mind. What was that code? Where are you? Who sent you here? Why? You struggle to think, but you can’t remember why you’re even here. Your memory centers are purging themselves.
